definition: sugar-coated bullets, term used by Mao (originally in 1949) to refer to corrupting bourgeois influences

sentences.english: The boy took one sip of the wine and spat it out.
sentences.chinese: 孩子喫掉了藥丸外面的糖衣，卻把藥心吐了出來。

sentences.english: Some fancy confections come decorated with warring couples made out of icing.
sentences.chinese: 蛋糕上通常裝飾有用糖衣製作的怨偶形象。

sentences.english: Invasion of the industrial civilization is sugar-coated poison.
sentences.chinese: “先進的”工業文明的侵略是糖衣包毒藥式的。
那些花生米都給裹上糖衣。

sentences.english: Sugar coating hides the taste of pills.
sentences.chinese: 糖衣掩蓋了藥片的藥味。

sentences.english: Or it can be so sugarcoated that it becomes a meaningless exercise in management.
sentences.chinese: 甚至它會在管理中成爲一顆毫無意義的糖衣炮彈。

sentences.english: Love like sugar, I bolt, enjoy the moment sweet illusion.
sentences.chinese: 愛似糖衣，我囫圇吞下，享受剎那甜蜜的錯覺。

sentences.english: A wedding cake has white icing .
sentences.chinese: 結婚蛋糕上蓋有白色糖衣。

sentences.english: Then we all gathered in our kitchen in front of the massive sheet cake. Anticipation mounted as we eyed the icing.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們齊聚廚房的蛋糕前，滿懷期待的想看到糖衣。

sentences.english: Love like sugar, I bolted to swallow and enjoy the moment sweet illusion.
sentences.chinese: 愛似糖衣，我囫圇吞下，享受剎那甜蜜的錯覺。

sentences.english: It's really like offering poison coated with sugar.
sentences.chinese: 這種行爲真的就像給他們送糖衣炮彈。

sentences.english: Look at anything above and beyond that as icing on the cake.
sentences.chinese: 其他那以上的都是蛋糕上的糖衣。

sentences.english: Method Adopt new technology of film coating to substitute for sugar coating.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用素丸表面包薄膜衣代替糖衣的新工藝。

sentences.english: If the pills were pleasant, they would not be gilded.
Sugar-coated pill in not bitter at all.
Cheers echoed through the house as we saw the pink icing.
sentences.chinese: 當我們看見粉紅色的糖衣，歡呼聲充滿了整座房子。

definition: to fill with stuffing (e.g. in cooking)/stuffed
rice paper/membrane of glutinous rice, used to wrap sweets etc
crispy/thin and brittle/a crispy fried cracker
soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)
